thread.title: London Budget
thread.title_full: London Budget - Review of Days Hotel London- Waterloo, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: heike0range
title: London Budget
text:
Great budget hotel to the south of Waterloo station but great for all amenities especially IWM and south bank. The staff were great and the only downside is its close proximitly to the hospital & police station, which despite the triple glazing can be a bit noisy with the sirens etc .... one added issue with the TG is that the room gets very hot at night and no AC. Ask for a room facing the rear!!
Room Tip: Go for a room at the rear due to traffic noise See more room tips
